wikipedia_page.main: Geoffrey Smith (30 November 1925 – 8 November 2016), known as Geoff Smith, was an English amateur cricketer who played for Kent County Cricket Club between 1951 and 1958. He made 42 appearances in first-class cricket for the county, playing in his holidays, and professionally worked on engineering projects around the world.
